title: Photos: A close-up look at Ukraine grain export inspections
description: At the heart of the Ukraine grain export deal is a complex inspection process involving Turkey and the U.N. NPR recently joined a team of inspectors aboard a ship carrying grain in the Marmara sea.
content:encoded:
At the heart of the Ukraine grain export deal is a complex inspection process involving Turkey and the U.N. NPR recently joined a team of inspectors aboard a ship carrying grain in the Marmara sea.

(Image credit: Danielle Villasana for NPR)
dc:creator: Danielle Villasana
